# isDeferredStartSupported

**Instance Property**

A `BOOL` value that indicates whether the preview layer supports deferred start.

## Declaration

```swift
var isDeferredStartSupported: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

You can only set the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureVideoPreviewLayer/isDeferredStartEnabled] property to `true` if the preview layer supports deferred start.

## Configuring deferred start

- **isDeferredStartEnabled**: A `BOOL` value that indicates whether to defer starting this preview layer.
